intro: Lychnis coelestis, commonly known as skyblue star, is a herbaceous perennial native to North America. It features showy, star-shaped blue to purple flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer. The plant has hairy, branching stems and heart-shaped leaves with toothed margins. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and partial to full shade. Lychnis coelestis is often found in woodland areas and is valued for its ornamental appeal and ecological benefits.
